LanguageData.SSVaperEmpty.label: Vaper (Empty)
LanguageData.SSVaperEmpty.description: Device to allow vaping of smokeleaf with a number of uses, though this is item is empty. It is slightly less harsh than a smokeleaf joint. Effects last about half a day.
LanguageData.SSVaperRegular.label: Vaper (Regular)
LanguageData.SSVaperRegular.description: Device to allow vaping of smokeleaf with a number of uses. It is slightly less harsh than a smokeleaf joint. Effects last about half a day.
LanguageData.SSVaperRefillRegular.label: Vaper Refill (Regular)
LanguageData.SSVaperRefillRegular.description: A cartridge used to refill vapers. This cartridge is filled with regular vape fluid.
LanguageData.SSVaperFruity.label: Vaper (Fruity)
LanguageData.SSVaperFruity.description: Device to allow vaping of smokeleaf with a number of uses. It is slightly less harsh than a smokeleaf joint. This vape has a distinctive fruity flavour. Effects last about half a day.
LanguageData.SSVaperRefillFruity.label: Vaper Refill (Fruity)
LanguageData.SSVaperRefillFruity.description: A cartridge used to refill vapers. This cartridge is filled with fruity vape fluid.
LanguageData.SSVaperMenthol.label: Vaper (Menthol)
LanguageData.SSVaperMenthol.description: Device to allow vaping of smokeleaf with a number of uses. It is slightly less harsh than a smokeleaf joint. This vape has a distinctive minty flavour. Effects last about half a day.
LanguageData.SSVaperRefillMenthol.label: Vaper Refill (Menthol)
LanguageData.SSVaperRefillMenthol.description: A cartridge used to refill vapers. This cartridge is filled with menthol vape fluid.
